items.title: Tech giants ramp up spending as AI starts to deliver
items.snippet: Tech companies are generating real revenue from AI investments and reinvesting heavily in data centers, signaling belief in the AI boom's early stages.

items.title: Artificial Intelligence In Patent And Market Intelligence: A New Paradigm For Technology Scouting
items.snippet: This paper presents the development of an AI-powered software platform that leverages advanced large language models (LLMs) to transform technology scouting and solution discovery in industrial R&D. The proposed platform utilizes cutting-edge LLM capabilities including semantic understanding, contextual reasoning, and cross-domain knowledge extraction to interpret problem statements and retrieve high-quality, sustainable solutions.

items.title: danielmiessler/fabric
items.snippet: Fabric is an open-source framework for augmenting humans using AI. It provides a modular framework for solving specific problems using a crowdsourced set of AI prompts that can be used anywhere.

items.title: CodePhiliaX/Chat2DB
items.snippet: AI-driven database tool and SQL client, supporting MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, DB2, SQL Server, DB2, SQLite, H2, ClickHouse, and more.

items.title: harry0703/MoneyPrinterTurbo
items.snippet: Generate short videos with one click using AI LLM.

items.title: n4ze3m/page-assist
items.snippet: Use your locally running AI models to assist you in your web browsing.

items.title: unslothai/unsloth
items.snippet: Finetune Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1 & Reasoning LLMs 2x faster with 70% less memory!

items.title: Shubhamsaboo/awesome-llm-apps
items.snippet: Collection of awesome LLM apps with AI Agents and RAG using OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini and opensource models.

queries: AI advancements latest news past 48 hours
AI advancements announcement OR launch OR unveils past 3 days
AI advancements breakthrough OR benchmark OR SOTA past week
AI advancements report OR analysis OR deep dive past week
AI advancements GitHub release OR repo trending past week

decision.reason: No clearly strong, novel, and credible signals specific to AI advancements within the last 48 hours are evident from the preview alone; items are generic repo stats or broad articles without verifiable recency details.
next_focus: Verify actual publication timestamps and key claims in the Axios piece to confirm recency and concrete AI advancement metrics (e.g., model performance, deployment footprints).
Check commit histories and release notes for the listed GitHub repos in the last 48 hours for substantive AI-related features or breakthroughs (not just stars or docs).
Scan major AI research/org feeds for 48h: arXiv cs.AI/cs.LG daily listings, OpenAI/Google/Meta/Anthropic/DeepMind blogs, and top labsâ€™ Twitter/X for newly released models, benchmarks, or papers.

queries: technical innovations latest news past 48 hours
technical innovations announcement OR launch OR unveils past 3 days
technical innovations breakthrough OR benchmark OR SOTA past week
technical innovations report OR analysis OR deep dive past week
technical innovations GitHub release OR repo trending past week

decision.reason: The preview items are a mix of general resources and repos without clear, time-bounded novelty; none provide strong, verified breakthroughs in the last 48 hours. Need targeted checks for credible, dated announcements or preprints.
next_focus: site:arxiv.org (cat: cs, eess) last 2 days "technical" OR "innovation" filter for cross-disciplinary methods (e.g., new chips, training methods, robotics)
site:news.ycombinator.com OR site:techcrunch.com past 2 days "announces" OR "launches" AND "platform" OR "model" OR "chip"
GitHub trending and releases past 48h: language:Python OR Rust keywords: "v1.0", "release", "RC", "breaking"; check OpenBB, burn, hrms release notes for dated changes
